name: European Boatmen's Association
goal: The European Boatmenâ€™s Association (EBA) was founded in 1977 as a non-profit association. The association represents boatmen active in European ports. Its main purpose is to foster the professional development of boatmen and to promote the interests and objectives of the association at European and international level.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Port policy
- Inland navigation
